channel.title: WoodnFab — Projects, Tools & Knowledge on Wood 'n Fab
channel.description: Recent content in WoodnFab — Projects, Tools & Knowledge on Wood 'n Fab

item.title: 2025-07-26 - CNC related links
item.description:
An overview of interesting links from today.

Website – CNC Workflow Using CNCjs

https://makerhardware.net/knowledge-base/how-to-guides/cnc-workflow-using-cncjs/

A helpful tutorial on using CNCjs for engraving.

YouTube – How to Build a Large CNC Router (Arduino GRBL + UGS)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DF_1bY8aJbc

A great build video showing how to create a large CNC router using an Arduino, GRBL, and Universal G-Code Sender (UGS).

Highlighted comment:

As somebody about to undertake building my own CNC router, this is the best video that breaks down the basic component design of the table. Mine will be different but this paints such a good picture for a starting point. Excellent work.

item.title: 2025-07-26 - MPCNC related
item.description:
An overview of interesting links from today.

Verkabelung und Steuerung der MPCNC: Eine Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitung

https://konstruktionsbude.de/mpcnc-verkabelung-steuerung/

A German page detailing the control of an MPCNC using an Arduino-based setup.

Also additional information on the MPCNC:

  • https://konstruktionsbude.de/mpcnc-primo/
  • https://konstruktionsbude.de/mpcnc-primo-einkaufsliste/

MPCNC Part 3

https://coeleveld.com/mpcnc-part-3/

Build description of an MPCNC.

MPCNC Primo – aktuelle Einkaufsliste für Deutschland 2025

https://www.frag-matze.de/heimwerken-mpcnc-primo-2020-teileliste-einkaufsliste-deutsch-deutschland

A current (2025) parts list for the MPCNC in Germany.

German supplier of MPCNC parts

https://www.hoerr-edelstahl.de/Restposten-Schnaeppchen-sonstige-Artikel/Rohr-Set-25-mm-Edelstahl-fuer-PRIMO-mostly-printed-MPCNC-Stangen-Arbeitsbereich.html

item.title: 2025-07-25 - Rascal CNC
item.description:
While browsing the web for information about ROOT CNC, I came across an intriguing CNC design:

Rascal CNC

The Rascal CNC is a hobby grade CNC machine designed BY the Community FOR the Community with the simple goal of being able to cut foam board airplanes.

Here are just a few benefits of owning a Rascal.

Most capable machine for the cost (under $500 USD) For the cost you won’t find a better suited machine to cut foam board and lite ply on its 30x30" (76cm) cut bed.

item.title: Openbuild build video
item.description:
Ooznest Workbee

Build video’s of an ooznest Workbee Z1+ by Irish woordworker Tommy

  • Ooznest Workbee Z1+ CNC Build Part 1/ What You Get In The Kit
  • Building A Workbee Z1+ CNC Part 2 / Wheels And Y-Plate Assembly
  • Building A Workbee Z1+ CNC Part 3 / X-Carriage Assembly
  • Building A Workbee Z1+ CNC Part 4 / Mechanical Assembly Completed
  • Building A Workbee Z1+ CNC Part 5 / Build is Finished
  • My First Project On The Workbee Z1+ CNC

Interesting parts
